Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface Depot

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtraDepot, NormalDepot
public interface Depot
This interface represents a generic depot of Maestri del Rinascimento board game. A depot can stock ResourceType occurrences. The resources contained in a depot must be only of the ResourceType associated with the depot itself. A depot has a limited size. There are two types of Depots : NormalDepot and ExtraDepot. This interface condenses the common methods of both implementations.
